name: Koppla
blurb: A responsive corporate website for Koppla Technology, a Spanish dev house. Built using Figma's MCP server to automatically extract design specifications and assets, enabling pixel-perfect implementation across five pages. Developed in Next.js 15, then exported to static HTML/CSS/JS for traditional shared hosting. Features a PHP backend leveraging the hosting provider's mail server for contact form functionality, combining modern workflows with pragmatic deployment strategies.
